biotools.summary: Creates an overlapping class system from an unweighted simple graph G = (V,E).OCG is essentially a hierarchical ascending algorithm. By default, it will fuse the initial classes until further fusions do not increase the modularity but other options are available.

bioschemas.name: OCG
bioschemas.summary: Creates an overlapping class system from an unweighted simple graph G = (V,E).OCG is essentially a hierarchical ascending algorithm. By default, it will fuse the initial classes until further fusions do not increase the modularity but other options are available.
